name: Donut Whole
description:
These six-inch chefs are sick and tired of people taking the holes out of donuts! A mix of basketball and mini-golf, Donut Whole has you returning donut-holes to their rightful donuts to return the world to its rightful order.

  • Space to power up your throws
  • W & S or up & down to smoothly change the angle
  • A & D or left & right to increment the angle up or down
